FuncDef: This command displays statistical RIP neighbor information at the configured interval until the configured count is reached.
CLIs: neighbor <neighbor> [ neighbor ] [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP interface name or the IP address of the neighbor to be monitored. Up to five can be specified in a single statement. Values-ip-int-name, ip-address.
Configures the interval for each display, in seconds. Values-3 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic instead of the delta.
